Improved Hunter's Mark.name: Improved Hunter's Mark
descriptions: Increases the attack power bonus of your Hunter's Mark by 20%, increases its duration by 1 min, and reduces its mana cost by 50%.
Increases the attack power bonus of your Hunter's Mark by 40%, increases its duration by 2 min, and reduces its mana cost by 100%.

Improved Arcane Shot.name: Improved Arcane Shot
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Shot by 10%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Shot by 20%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Shot by 30%.

Efficiency.name: Efficiency
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your spells and abilities by 3%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your spells and abilities by 6%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your spells and abilities by 9%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your spells and abilities by 12%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your spells and abilities by 15%.

Stalking.name: Stalking
descriptions:
After killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, your critical strike chance is increased by 5% and reducing the amount of all threat generated by 90% for 20 seconds.

In addition, reduces the cooldown of your Rapid Fire and Rapid Strikes by 1 min.

After killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, your critical strike chance is increased by 10% and reducing the amount of all threat generated by 90% for 20 seconds.

In addition, reduces the cooldown of your Rapid Fire and Rapid Strikes by 2 min.

Improved Concussive Shot.name: Improved Concussive Shot
descriptions: Gives your Concussive Shot a 10% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Concussive Shot a 20% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Concussive Shot a 30% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.

Lethal Shots.name: Lethal Shots
descriptions: Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 1%.
Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 2%.
Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 3%.
Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 4%.
Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 5%.

Aimed Shot.name: Aimed Shot
descriptions: An aimed shot that increases ranged damage by 70.

Improved Stings.name: Improved Stings
descriptions:
Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting and Wyvern Sting by 10% and the mana drained by your Viper Sting by 10%. 
In addition, reduces the Stamina and Intellect of targets affected by your Scorpid Sting by 10% of the amount of Strength reduced.

Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting and Wyvern Sting by 20% and the mana drained by your Viper Sting by 20%. 
In addition, reduces the Stamina and Intellect of targets affected by your Scorpid Sting by 30% of the amount of Strength reduced.

Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting and Wyvern Sting by 30% and the mana drained by your Viper Sting by 30%. 
In addition, reduces the Stamina and Intellect of targets affected by your Scorpid Sting by 50% of the amount of Strength reduced.

Mortal Shots.name: Mortal Shots
descriptions: Increases your ranged weapon critical strike damage bonus by 10%.
Increases your ranged weapon critical strike damage bonus by 20%.
Increases your ranged weapon critical strike damage bonus by 30%.

Hawk Eye.name: Hawk Eye
descriptions: Increases the range of your ranged weapons by 3 yards.
Increases the range of your ranged weapons by 6 yards.

Crossbow Specialization.name: Crossbow Specialization
descriptions: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Crossbows by 1%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Crossbows by 2%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Crossbows by 3%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Crossbows by 4%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Crossbows by 5%.

Bow Specialization.name: Bow Specialization
descriptions: Gives you a 1% chance to launch an extra arrow to the same target after dealing damage with your Bow.
Gives you a 2% chance to launch an extra arrow to the same target after dealing damage with your Bow.
Gives you a 3% chance to launch an extra arrow to the same target after dealing damage with your Bow.
Gives you a 4% chance to launch an extra arrow to the same target after dealing damage with your Bow.
Gives you a 5% chance to launch an extra arrow to the same target after dealing damage with your Bow.

Gun Specialization.name: Gun Specialization
descriptions: Causes your shots to ignore up to 120(scales with your level) of your target's Armor when carrying a Gun.
Causes your shots to ignore up to 240(scales with your level) of your target's Armor when carrying a Gun.
Causes your shots to ignore up to 360(scales with your level) of your target's Armor when carrying a Gun.
Causes your shots to ignore up to 480(scales with your level) of your target's Armor when carrying a Gun.
Causes your shots to ignore up to 600(scales with your level) of your target's Armor when carrying a Gun.

Snapshot.name: Snapshot
descriptions: Reduces the shot time of your Aimed Shot and Multi-Shot by 0.2 sec.
Reduces the shot time of your Aimed Shot and Multi-Shot by 0.4 sec.
Reduces the shot time of your Aimed Shot and Multi-Shot by 0.6 sec.
Reduces the shot time of your Aimed Shot and Multi-Shot by 0.8 sec.
Reduces the shot time of your Aimed Shot and Multi-Shot by 1 sec.

Barrage.name: Barrage
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot and Volley spells by 10%.
Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot and Volley spells by 20%.
Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot and Volley spells by 30%.

Scatter Shot.name: Scatter Shot
descriptions: A short-range shot that deals damage and disorients the target for 5 seconds.  Any damage caused will remove the effect.  Turns off your attack when used.

Deadeye.name: Deadeye
descriptions: When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next Aimed Shot, Multi-Shot or Arcane Shot by 100%.

Reconnaissance.name: Reconnaissance
descriptions: Increases your damage by 3% if you've been standing still for ~10 sec.
Increases your damage by 6% if you've been standing still for ~10 sec.
Increases your damage by 9% if you've been standing still for ~10 sec.
Increases your damage by 12% if you've been standing still for ~10 sec.
Increases your damage by 15% if you've been standing still for ~10 sec.

Ranged Weapon Specialization.name: Ranged Weapon Specialization
descriptions: Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 2%.
Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 4%.
Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 6%.
Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 8%.
Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 10%.

Trueshot Aura.name: Trueshot Aura
descriptions: Increases the ranged attack power of party members within 45 yds by 100 and melee attack power by 50.
